metadata.name: Locked Starting Items
metadata.description:
A mod that locks the starting items of each character, [spoiler]like with the tainted characters[/spoiler].
I feel like locking the start items is much better, because you don't have to throw away the (mostly useless in the later course) start item, which makes a character more individual :)
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2775981002]Locked Starting Trinkets[/url]
[url=https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/3765/locked-starting-items]Modding of Isaac[/url]
